__e: Look, if Dad finds out I helped you do this, he's going to lose it.
Traveled the world, made people smile, forget about their problems for a while. And then my heart said, "Well, you're done".
"Most of the people here have been saved by you, or helped by you, at one time or another."
Well, it didn't help us any, and I can barely move.
I want to thank you, you have been very cooperative and it comes bli individual without you.
Look, I know that you're dealing with a lot, but you helped keep this contained, and you were the right face to put in front of the public.
